author: Erik Beaston
title: WWE WrestleMania 36 Predictions for John Cena vs. the Fiend and Top Matches
description: The single most-unique WrestleMania of all-time takes place Saturday and Sunday, April 4 and 5, from the WWE Performance Center in Orlando and despite the adverse effects of the coronavirus ...
content:
Credit: WWE.com
Roman Reigns confirmed earlier this week in an Instagram post that he was out of the main event of WrestleMania, no longer to challenge Goldberg for the Universal Championship, over concerns of the COVID-19 virus, its effect on his compromise… [+1238 chars]
